framework:entity-query.name: employeeQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select e from Employee e order by e.firstName ASC

framework:entity-query.name: jobQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select j from Job j order by j.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: contractStateQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from ContractState c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: organizationalLevelQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select o from OrganizationalLevel o order by o.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: organizationalUnitQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select distinct object(o) from OrganizationalUnit o order by o.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: contractModeQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from ContractMode c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: kindOfSalaryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select k from KindOfSalary k order by k.type ASC

framework:entity-query.name: discountPolicyQueryforEmployees
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select d from DiscountPolicy d where d.discountPolicyType.target = 'EMPLOYEE' order by d.name

framework:entity-query.name: salaryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select o from Salary o order by o.amount ASC

framework:entity-query.name: contractQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select o from Contract o order by o.numberOfContract ASC

framework:entity-query.name: gestionPayrollQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select o from GestionPayroll o order by o.gestionName ASC

framework:entity-query.name: gestionPayrollFilteredQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select gp.gestionPayroll from GeneratedPayroll gp

framework:entity-query.name: gestionPayrollToManagersSummaryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select gp.gestionPayroll from GeneratedPayroll gp

framework:entity-query.name: gestionPayrollToAcademicSummaryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select gp.gestionPayroll from GeneratedPayroll gp

framework:entity-query.name: gestionPayrollToLaboralProfessorSummaryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select gp.gestionPayroll from GeneratedPayroll gp

framework:entity-query.name: gestionPayrollToChristmasSummaryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select gp.gestionPayroll from GeneratedPayroll gp

framework:entity-query.name: creditorQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Creditor c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: creditor4EmployeeQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Creditor4Employee c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: check4EmployeeQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Check4Employee c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: rHMarkQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from RHMark c order by c.marDate ASC

framework:entity-query.name: horaryBandContractQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from HoraryBandContract c order by c.initDate ASC

framework:entity-query.name: horaryBandQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from HoraryBand c order by c.initHour ASC

framework:entity-query.name: horaryBandInitDayQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select distinct c.initDay from HoraryBand c order by c.initDay ASC

framework:entity-query.name: horaryBandEndDayQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select distinct c.endDay from HoraryBand c order by c.endDay ASC

framework:entity-query.name: toleranceQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Tolerance c order by c.beforeInit ASC

framework:entity-query.name: limitQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select l from Limit l order by l.beforeInit ASC

framework:entity-query.name: periodQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Period c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: horaryCycleQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from HoraryCycle c order by c.cycleHrInitDate ASC

framework:entity-query.name: sectorQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Sector c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: bankEntityQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from BankEntity c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: subjectQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Subject c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: subjectGroupQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from SubjectGroup c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: jobCategoryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from JobCategory c

framework:entity-query.name: activeJobCategoryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from JobCategory c

framework:entity-query.name: academicJobCategoryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from JobCategory c

framework:entity-query.name: administrativeJobCategoryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from JobCategory c

framework:entity-query.name: salaryPeriodJobCategoryQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from JobCategory c

framework:entity-query.name: controlReportQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from ControlReport c order by c.idNumber ASC, c.date ASC, c.day ASC, c.initHour ASC, c.endHour ASC

framework:entity-query.name: generalPayrollQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from GeneralPayroll c order by c.liquid ASC

framework:entity-query.name: generatedPayrollQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from GeneratedPayroll c order by c.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: evaluationCriteriaQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select ec from EvaluationCriteria ec order by ec.name ASC

framework:entity-query.name: sectionQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select s from Section s

framework:entity-query.name: locationQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select l from Location l order by l.name asc

framework:entity-query.name: facultyQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select f from Faculty f

framework:entity-query.name: careerQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Career c

framework:entity-query.name: subjectQueryByCareer
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select s from Subject s

framework:entity-query.name: cycleQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Cycle c order by c.name asc

framework:entity-query.name: cycleQueryByGestion
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Cycle c

framework:entity-query.name: academicPeriodQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select a from AcademicPeriod a order by a.sequence asc

framework:entity-query.name: postulantQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Postulant c order by c.lastName ASC

framework:entity-query.name: degreeQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Degree c

framework:entity-query.name: currencyListQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Currency c order by c.name asc

framework:entity-query.name: salaryMovementTypeListQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select smt from SalaryMovementType smt order by smt.name asc

framework:entity-query.name: salaryMovementTypeListByAccessRightQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select smt from SalaryMovementType smt

framework:entity-query.name: sedeListQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select o from BusinessUnit o order by o.position ASC

framework:entity-query.name: pollFormListQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select pollForm from PollForm pollForm order by pollForm.title ASC

framework:entity-query.name: pollFormListByCycleQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select pollForm from PollForm pollForm

framework:entity-query.name: pollFormByGrouppingTypeListQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select pollForm from PollForm pollForm

framework:entity-query.name: countEvaluationCriteriaValueQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select count(o) from EvaluationCriteriaValue o

framework:entity-query.name: maxEvaluationCriteriaValueSequence
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select max(o.sequence) from EvaluationCriteriaValue o

framework:entity-query.name: gestionQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select o from Gestion o order by o.year ASC

framework:entity-query.name: cycleTypeQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select distinct c from CycleType c

framework:entity-query.name: questionsByPollFormQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: SELECT question FROM Question question left join fetch question.section section left join section.pollForm pollForm

framework:entity-query.name: chargeListQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select c from Charge c order by c.name asc

framework:entity-query.name: employeeAcademicFormationCountByNameQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select count(eaf) from EmployeeAcademicFormation eaf

framework:entity-query.name: bonusListQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select o from Bonus o

framework:entity-query.name: activeBonusListQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select o from Bonus o

framework:entity-query.name: jobContractByEmployeeIdNumberQuickSearchQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select jc from JobContract jc left join jc.contract ct left join ct.employee emp

framework:entity-query.name: jobContractByEmployeeIdAndNumberAndNotByTimeQuickSearchQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select jc from JobContract jc left join jc.contract ct left join jc.job job left join job.jobCategory jobCategory left join ct.employee emp

framework:entity-query.name: socialWelfareEntityQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select swe from SocialWelfareEntity swe order by swe.name

framework:entity-query.name: socialWelfareEntityCountQuery
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select count(swe) from SocialWelfareEntity swe order by swe.name
